briefTitle: Albumin-bound Paclitaxel (ABI-007) for Patients With Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized, Phase III Trial of ABI-007 and Carboplatin Compared With Taxol and Carboplatin as First-Line Therapy in Patients With Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC)
summary: The purpose of this study is to compare disease response of Albumin-bound paclitaxel (ABI-007) plus Carboplatin versus Taxol and Carboplatin as first-line therapy in patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved an Objective Confirmed Complete Response or Partial Response by Blinded Radiology Assessment
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Objective response was evaluated every 6 weeks until progression or new anti-cancer therapy initiation, up to 22 months.
